channel.title: bibliometrics on Data By Dan
channel.description: Recent content in bibliometrics on Data By Dan

item.title: The John Oliver Effect
item.description: Background John Oliver recently discussed genetic editing on Last Week Tonight. Luckily by chance I have had an automated R script running everyday that collects all tweets that mention the term CRISPR, the leading method of genetic editing at this time. Bringing these two events together, I am interested to see how John Oliver discussing genetic editing might impact the level of social media activity surrounding the topic, represented by the tweets captured mentioned CRISPR.
